page.title: 09D.B. SCHOOL CONTD.
page.content: There are approximately{250} {children}at the present scool. There are roughly the same number of girls as boys. There are twelve staff. Three of these are male teachers and nine female teachers.he subjects taught are music, French, Maths, Language, Computer Studies, E.S., R.E., P.E., Games and Home Economics. They have an {assembly}for the whole school on Friday and then class assemblies on every other day. They have just had a new Art and Craft area built in. They have two kitchens and a canteen. The different {sports}they play are cricket, rounders, football, swimming, netball and soft tennis. They also have a school field. There is a school {choir}but only when the teachers are not on strike.
